name: Saturday Night is the Loneliest Night of the Week
name_original: Saturday Night is the Loneliest Night of the Week
description: A quick little adventure game created for the February MAGS game jam.  You wash up on some faraway beach.  Did you party too hard or did you just listen to the wrong Woody Herman cassette tape?  Find out in this light-hearted romp and you may find yourself embroiled in a real adventure!
